title: Grimm's Fairy Tales
brief_description: Three classic stories that will stimulate young children’s imaginations with adventures of fantasy and fun. Join Hayley Mills as she leads you through these animated tales that include, “The Fisherman and His Wife”, “Tom Thumb”, “Seven With One Blow”, and “The Youth Who Wanted to Shiver”. Rated: G
